paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses BRCA2 variants in high-risk prostate cancer pedigrees, identifying one variant of uncertain significance and one intronic variant, with no known deleterious mutations observed.

individual_records.phenotype_details: last known age to be cancer free
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The variant of unknown significance (5972C→T) was detected in an unaffected male 1st cousin (last known age to be cancer free: 72 years) but was not carried by the sampled prostate cancer case in the pedigree (diagnosis age: 54 years).

variants.segregation_data: Not segregating with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was not carried by the sampled prostate cancer case.
key_quotes: We observed one BRCA2 variant of unknown significance as defined by the Breast Cancer Information Core (BIC) database.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The intronic variant not previously reported in the BIC database (IVS14 -62A→G) was observed in a single prostate cancer case.

variants.segregation_data: Not segregating with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was not detected in the other haplotype carrier tested in the pedigree.
key_quotes: The intronic variant not previously reported in the BIC database (IVS14 -62A→G) was observed in a single prostate cancer case.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted from the text.
